scripts.build: npm run js && npm run css && npm run html && npm run mandoc1 && npm run mandoc3
scripts.js: for file in assets/js/*.js; do uglifyjs --compress --mangle --source-map "url='/${file/.js/.min.js}.map',content='${file}.map',filename='${file/.js/.min.js}.map'" --output "${file/.js/.min.js}" -- "$file"; done
scripts.prehtml: npm run stats && npm run projects && npm run license && npm run changelog
scripts.html: for file in src/*-body.html; do node build.mjs "$file" > ${file%-body.html}.html ; done
scripts.stats: printf 'scale=3; %d / %d\n' `git show master:test/src/unit_tests.c master:test/src/unit_tests.h master:test/src/common_unit_test.c master:test/src/common_unit_test.h | wc -l` `git show master:src/getargv.c master:src/getargv.h | wc -l` | /usr/bin/bc > src/stats.html
scripts.mandoc1: git show master:man/getargv.1 | mandoc -T html -O 'style=assets/css/mandoc.css,man=x-man-page://%S/%N' > src/man1.html
scripts.mandoc3: git show master:man/libgetargv.3 | mandoc -T html -O 'style=assets/css/mandoc.css,man=x-man-page://%S/%N' > src/man3.html
scripts.presitemap: echo "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n<?xml-stylesheet type=\"text/xsl\" href=\"assets/sitemap.xsl\" ?>\n<urlset xmlns=\"http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9\">" > docs/sitemap.xml
scripts.sitemap: find docs -name '*.html' \! \( -name index.html -o -path node_modules \) | sed -Ee 's|docs/(.+)|<url><loc>https://getargv.narzt.cam/\1</loc></url>|g' >> docs/sitemap.xml
scripts.deploy: find src -name '*.html' \! \( -path 'node_modules' -o -name '*-body.html' -o -name '*-sidebar.html' -o -name 'template.html' -o -name '*-blurb.html' \) -depth 1 -exec fgrep -l '<html' {} \; | xargs -J {} cp -r {} assets docs && rm -rf docs/assets/sass docs/assets/ts docs/assets/images/Full-Res $(find docs/assets/ -name '*.map' -o -name '*_inject.css' -o \( -name '*.js' \! -name '*.min.js' \))
scripts.images: awk '/: +\( [^)]+px +\),/{gsub(/px/,"");print $4}' assets/sass/main.scss | awk '{print int($0*0.60) "\n" int($0*0.92) "\n" $0}' | while read res; do for file in images/Full-Res/*.{png,jpg} ; do sips --resampleWidth $res $file -o ${file%.*}.$res.${file##*.}; done ; done
